description:
go.tools/ssa: Function.Synthetic documents provenance of synthetic functions.

We use the new field to determine whether or not a function is
synthetic, not Pos() == 0, so synthetic functions can have
positions too.

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a5f075c30009&repo=tools ***

go.tools/ssa: Function.Synthetic documents provenance of synthetic functions.

We use the new field to determine whether or not a function is
synthetic, not Pos() == 0, so synthetic functions can have
positions too.
